subject: RXIL-TReDS - Bids Accepted ({{sysDate}})
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,


The following bid(s) on your factoring unit(s) have been accepted today on TReDS.

Factoring Unit ID, Factoring Unit Amount, Invoice No., Invoice Count, Invoice Date, Seller, Buyer, Financier Name, Bid Date, Bid-Rate, Bid Accepted Date, Bid Acceptance Type (Auto/Manual), Expected Net Payment, Expected Settlement Date (T+1 or T+2)
{{fuId}}, {{fuAmount}} , {{invoiceNo}}, {{instCount}}, {{invoiceDate}}, {{supName}} , {{purName}} , {{finName}} , {{bidDate}}, {{bidRate}}, {{bidAcceptedDate}}, {{bidAcceptType}}, {{netPayment}}, {{settlementDate}}
